channel.title: Coding shops
channel.description: Hey guys please dont flame , I know its one of the easiest processess in coding but I still dont know how. How Do I code shops? Thanks in advance for helping

item.title: Coding shops
item.dc:creator: @jefersonpang jefersonpang
item.description:
@jefersonpang wrote:

[quote=“hammy846, post:7, topic:451960”]so would this work? Shop=51 2 4716 100
That would be 100 dharok helms in hamab’s store right?[/quote]ehh not exatcly.
its gonna be two 2s for non general store. after the shop name u need probably 3 tabs it’ll be more like this. shop = 51 Hamab's Wares 2 2 4716 100

Read full topic

item.title: Coding shops
item.dc:creator: @jefersonpang jefersonpang
item.description:
@jefersonpang wrote:

ok so u go to source>config>shops.cfg and itll say:

shop = 51 Hamab's Wares 2 2 1963 126 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2 1755 2 2347 5 550 5 243 6 1149 1 2420 2 4006 1 4010 5 4012 53 4014 1 4016 3 4033 1 4079 2
[table]
[tr]
[td]51 = shop id(whats recognized in client.java[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]
[table]
[tr]
[td]Hamab’s Wares = shop name[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]
[table]
[tr]
[td]2 2 = not general store. change to 1 if u want it to be a general store where it can sell anything. [/td]
[/tr]
[/table][table]
[tr]
[td] then the numbers after 2: 1st number is item id(which can be found in item.cfg
2nd number is the quantity of items sold in shop[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

Read full topic

item.title: Coding shops
item.dc:creator: @jefersonpang jefersonpang
item.description:
@jefersonpang wrote:

search client.java for wanneshop should look like this

			} else if (NPCID == 584) {//npc id
				// Heruin
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 12; // <shop id

follow the npc id and shop id change them to ur likings and edit shops in shops.cgf
